definition: to change route/to divert (a road or a watercourse)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: At last, the authors presented the standard to judge debris flow changing its course in grooves.
sentences.chinese: 创建了沟谷泥石流流通沟槽发生改道运动的判断标准。

sentences.english: The travellers knowing about the floods took another road.
sentences.chinese: 知道发大水的那些游客改道走了。

sentences.english: and legions of engineers capable of rerouting giant rivers like the Yangtze.
sentences.chinese: 众多的可以让长江这样的大河改道的工程师。

sentences.english: The traffic diversion was due to an accident on the mainroad.
sentences.chinese: 车辆改道是因为干道上发生了交能事故。

sentences.english: D: It's too far to walk. Shall we take another road?
sentences.chinese: 步行去太远了。我们改道走行吗？

sentences.english: Many houses in the village were carried away when the swollen river suddenly changed its course.
sentences.chinese: 这条涨满水的河突然改道，冲走了村子里好几幢房子。

sentences.english: CFP, and the ability to retain polling for backward compatibility, result in more efficient polling.
sentences.chinese: CFP改道访问维轮询兼容性，带更效轮询。

sentences.english: And probably that was the reason why they changed directions.
sentences.chinese: 这恐怕就是他们改道而行的原因。

sentences.english: No.103 trolleybus was rerouted due to the renovation of Chang'an Street.
sentences.chinese: 第103路无轨电车因长安街的整修而改道行驶。

sentences.english: The travellers, knowing about the floods, took another road.
sentences.chinese: 游客们知道发了大水，都改道走了。

sentences.english: There's a switch nearby that would let you divert the train onto a siding.
sentences.chinese: 转辙器就在旁边，它可以使你让火车改道到岔线去。

sentences.english: Gan River lower reaches Stream was divagated and transited several times in history.
sentences.chinese: 赣江下游河道在历史上曾发生过多次改道变迁。

sentences.english: Take the energy of the negative thought and rechannel it into a positive thought.
sentences.chinese: 让消极思想的能量改道流向积极思想。

sentences.english: Whenever I uncovered a negative thought, I plucked it out and redirected it.
sentences.chinese: 每当我发觉一种消极想法，就会把它挑出来改道。
高速道路可是改道建设。

sentences.english: Several houses in the village were carried away when the swollen river suddenly changed its course.
sentences.chinese: 这条涨满水的河突然改道，冲走了村子里好几幢房子。

definition: to make a detour/to take the long route
to go by a roundabout route/to take a detour/(medicine or civil engineering) bypass
variant of 掉頭|掉头[diao4 tou2]
